title: New & MPFree: Shield Your Eyes – Larkspur
content:
Shield Your Eyes are a truly exciting prospect for modern guitar music.

Anyone who’s ever seen them ply their fractured (in pretty much every sense of the word) antics live will attest to that. Mainman Stef smashes out seemingly arbitrary lead lines on a busted-up mutant of a guitar, to fearsomely competent beats and skewed basslines. If a string breaks, well fuck it. They’ll blast on regardless. Somehow, amongst all the frantic noise, there’s buckets of lopsided melody – one listen to new track Larkspur, from forthcoming release Volume 4, and you’ll understand what I mean. Head over to the Function Records bandcamp for a free download. Shield Your Eyes have two more dates on our shores before embarking on a European tour, so catch ’em while you can!

08 Oct Triple Jump Alldayer Fighting Cocks
18 Oct Volume 4 Launch night Ryans Bar London
